Question
========

A researcher expects that the linear relationship between maternal depressive symptoms (sum scores on questionnaire) and the child's temperament (sum scores on questionnaire) disappears the moment attachment (secure/insecure) is controlled for. Which model is most appropriate for testing this hypothesis? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA.
* Two-way ANOVA.
* Single linear regression.
* Multiple logistic regression.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
